subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Daisuke Matsuzaka struck out the side in the first inning and allowed only one run over six innings in what might have been his final shot at securing the role of the Mets’ fifth starter.
snippet: Daisuke Matsuzaka struck out the side in the first inning and allowed only one run over six innings in what might have been his final shot at securing the role of the Mets’ fifth starter.
